attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a tax payer i DON'T want my money being spent on drugs!
 
It's a vicious circle that the government need to do something about, drug users find it hard to get jobs because the drugs make them unfit to work,so they claim benefits, which gets spent on drugs.Where will it end!!

They'd be alot less tax dodgers if they knew their money wasn't going to support their drug habbit!
